required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Fitostimoline Vaginal Pessaries in Women With Hysterectomy. Randomized, Perspective, Monoscentric Study.
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Verification of the Activity and Tolerability of Fitostimoline Vaginal Pessaries in Women With Hysterectomy. Randomized, Perspective, Monoscentric Study.

brief_summary.textblock: Clinical evaluation of Fitostimoline vaginal pessaries in the treatment of hysterectomy. An observational, randomized, perspective study performed on 60 women where 30 women are treated with fitostimoline pessaries and 30 women are treated with the standard of care.

primary_outcome.description: total symptom score (TSS) on a scale from 0 to 10 from worst to best

study_pop.textblock: women aged between 30 and 80 years with hysterctomy.
